entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Missing unhandled exception header in unhandledTester #109203
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Variance/Methods/Method002 failing all 12 test cases #109202
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: 2 variance safety test failures in SVM VarianceSafety #109201
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Failures in GenericContextTest / GenericContextTestDefaultImp #109200
  • [API Proposal]: YAML configuration provider #109199
    Future
  • Very slow access to certain site when IPv6 is enabled #109195
  • System.UnauthorizedAccessException using Directory.GetFiles in user documents folder #109194
  • Analyzer doesn't offer correct fix for missing [DAM] for RuntimeHelpers.GetUninitializedObject #109189
  • WasmImportLinkage is not propagated in LibraryImport #109181
    10.0.0
  • Runtime repo signing is broken inside the VMR #109178
  • Problems when crosscompiling and statically linking openssl and icu #109175
    Future
  • Program hangs on dotnet9 rc2 #109172
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm] Empty struct type ctors should be removed when building with AOT #109170

Closed

  • [S.T.Json] EnumConverterFactory IL3050 when NativeAOT publish with `JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault`=true #109177
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] New failure condition introduced by anonymous mmap implementation #107215
    10.0.0
  • Strange behavior of System.ComponentModel.Int128Converter #109148
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory for InvalidEnumArgumentException #109099
  • Test failure: NuGet.RestoreEx.targets at "NuGet.NoAllocEnumerateExtensions.OptimisticallyNonAllocatingEnumerable" #107361
  • [NativeAOT] LibraryImport resolves to own exported functions with the same name, even if a custom module name is specified #109150
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on IPAddress & IPNetwork #103111
    10.0.0
  • WasmTestOnChrome timeouts in CI #105363
    10.0.0
  • GCHandle.Free should raise errors on misuse #12278
  • How to Cross Compile Linux-arm64 Native Shared Libraries on Ubuntu x64 Platform #109162
  • threading.SleepEx.test2 fails sporadically on CentOs #7056
  • Question:Why we need to check the IsIoPending when the thread pool thread going to exit? #8377
  • Proposal - Incorporate deadlock detection into the CLR. #10335
  • YIELD_WHILE/DangerousNonHostedSpinLockHolder should be modernized #11563
  • GetAssembly of CurrentDomain by Name (AMD Ryzen slowdown) #12621
  • Audit usage of `move register, 0` pattern #33556
  • Backport needed for ARM32 Year 2038 issue fix to .Net 8.x from .Net 9.0 #109161

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix stack overflow in compiler-generated state #109207
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Forward the ForceDryRunSigning variable down to the runtime inner build #109206
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable some red tests for crossgen2 and associate with issue URLs #109204
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix typo in PackageDownloadAndReference.targets #109197
    needs-area-label
  • Factor LibraryImports into Common\ for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #109196
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Handle UPN name constraints more consistently across platforms #109193
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update `wellknownattributes.h` #109191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate LCL_ADDRs into natural loops #109190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] GetMethodDescData for jitted methods #109187
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Sending an extra information with type_load to avoid slowness. #109185
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Cleanup NET8_0_OR_GREATER ifdef in json converters #109176
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add ReferenceHandler to JsonSourceGenerationOptions #109174
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Linux/arm: LSRA resolution issues #109173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use the SDK support for packaging up PGO data in a way that can be consumed in other projects #109169
    area-Infrastructure, PGO, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Add old x86 JIT GC info spec #109171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use libclang from dotnet/llvm-project for offsets-tool.py #109188
    area-Build-mono
  • [cdac] Implement `ISOSDacInterface::GetModule` and `IXCLRDataModule::GetFileName` #109133
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate LCL_ADDRs into handlers #109182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.58, windows: 130.0.6723.59 #109053
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs and CDacMetadata contracts #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109180
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Bump Android devcontainer from Jammy to Noble #109153
    area-Meta, os-android
  • [LoongArch64] Sync with PR#107282: Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks. #109102
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Block `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest` with `EnableAggressiveTrimming && Scenario=WasmTestOnChrome` #109179
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Expose additional JIT metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move `Intrinsic` generation to use the transient code gen for `CopyConstruct`. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Split the HostApplicationBuilder configuration. #107616
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Use properties for some [GeneratedRegex]s #109118
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.12
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Fix SortedSet.IsSubsetOf (and friends) 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • FileShare change to ReadWrite #109104
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to 24 sep 24 #2730
  • [SwiftBinding] Made the node reducer completely static #2729

Merged

  • HikingApp Mac Catalyst sample app #2726
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat not catching extracting a method from interface to 'base' interface #44426
  • Application Crash when libpng is installed on the system macOS Sequoia #44425

Closed

  • .NET 9.0 SDK is shipping unpatched copies of System.Text.Json #44197
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove net2.1 targets for test that's failing sometimes #44442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add *.props and *.targets to XML section of .editorconfig template #44441
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable VMR signing #44437
    untriaged, Area-VMR, 10.0.1xx
  • Correctly set ContinueOnError for RemoveDir when cleaning repos #44434
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add SDK support for rooting subsets of inputs in a composite image. #44436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update checksum links to use SHA512 #44383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix official build. Correctly condition GenerateMSBuildExtensionsLayo… #44435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire

Updated

  • [ADD] dotnet solution: Migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Draft] Adding --format support to `dotnet new list` #44140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix cyclic assignment ref safety docs #8536

Merged

  • Fix some typos in ref proposals #8532

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error message for non-collection typed `params` is unclear #75623
  • Assert in OperationExtensions.GetValueUsageInfo for not matching IListPatternOperation #75622
  • An `unmanaged` constraint check causes a stack overflow in an error scenario #75620
    17.13

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35423.134 #75614

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue in PatternMatcher code where it was using a caseInsensitive index #75621
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75617
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Allow the client to update the server logging level dynamically #75615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce lock usage during EditDistance.GetEditDistance and BKTree.Find #75610
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use distinct EventSource names for compiler and workspace layer events #75613
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Ensure we only capture the BuildNumber when setting OriginalBuildNumber. #75616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix spelling of an error message #75601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • When replacing CodeStyle analyzers do not provide Features analyzers fallback options #75534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable flakey test TestHandleExceptionFromGetCompletionChange #75612
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure that `GetSymbolInfo` returns only constructor symbols for object creation expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Propagate spread suppression #75596
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenAPI and add support for OpenAPI v3.1 #58619
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Open API] Nullability set on component schema level and not operation. Causing multiple component schemas being generated. #58617
  • Blazor WebAssembly - HTML select tag with @onchange event does not hit breakpoint when clicking to select values from dropdown using the cursor, but works with up/down key from keyboard #58615
  • Perf regression: json #58611
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextSansFilter #58610
  • my clients logouts after 30 minutes #58609
  • When adding attribute ResponseCacheAttribute, it does not take any effect. #58604
  • dotnet watch sometimes broken when ItemGroup was added #58603
  • dotnet watch run 自动退出，提示Exited with error code -1073740940 #58601

Closed

  • YAML configuration provider #58614
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, updates #58595
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #58602
  • Visual studio ignoring docker file #58064
  • Blazor Server - @key can crash the circuit #58385

PullRequests

Created

  • Use FullName in InstallJdk script #58618
    area-infrastructure
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/2.3] Update EF Submodule to 2.3 #58613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Adjust PGO data path #58600
    blocked, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • 54978 02 #58592
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • if actual bytes to be written is negative, set to zero #58575
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Prevent unnecessary debugger stops for user-unhandled exceptions in Blazor apps with Just My Code enabled #58573
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0.1
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

    10.0.0

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Menu Bar - ContentPage.MenuBarItems doesn't render on Android? #25516
  • [SF, Template] Additional discussions for the SF Template #25515
  • [iOS 18] Grouped CollectionView with header template and templateselector crashes immediately on iOS 18, works on iOS 17 #25514
  • FlyoutPage memory leaks - iOS, MacCatalyst #25505
  • [Testing] Write UI Test for https://github.com/dotnet/maui/pull/25453 #25504
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Gray Line Appears on the Right Side of GraphicsView with Decimal WidthRequest on iOS Platform #25502
  • iOS singleton dependency injection wrong lifecycle #25501
  • .NET MAUI SplashScreen PNG Resizing Incorrectly to Circular Shape #25500
  • [Android] Grid is resizing when tapped #25499
    Backlog
  • [Android] Grid is trembling #25498
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] RefreshView does not layout properly when it is placed inside a Grid #25496
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • 在Visual Studio上运行Android设备管理器中的仿真器时，出现报错，虚拟化各种服务均开启正常，请问应该怎么才能解决？ #25495
  • [ci] Validate the usage of all variables for public and private pipelines #25493
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [ci] Fix compliance errors #25492
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [ci] Improve CI agents and pools #25491
    .NET 9 SR1

Closed

  • Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #10238
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp #25421
    .NET 9.0 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Android: Opt out of edge to edge enforcement on api 35+ #25517
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 9 GA #25509
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    community ✨
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • Fixed UI Test Issue on Windows Platform in Visual Studio #25507
    community ✨
  • [main] Fixed UI Test Issue on Windows Platform in Visual Studio #25508
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25494
    community ✨, area-compatibility
  • 25421- ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp and BindingError was occured in windows platforms #25453
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Updated

  • Add New .NET MAUI Template with Syncfusion Toolkit Integration #25419
    area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fix Button Regression with null image source #25485
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for TextDecorations not updating after modifying Label text #25339
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [NO_MERGE] WIP: Testing iossim hangs #25467
    do-not-merge
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • [Windows] Fix Shell.Flyout menu disappears when pressing Alt key #25479
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area-testing
  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Discrepancy with Temporal tables results #34972
  • When is "order by" generated in the underlying sql command text #34971
  • EFCore 9 RC2 - AsNoTracking doens't work at the Context Level (.UseQueryTrackingBehavior(QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking)) #34970
  • EFCore 9 - SqlServer - RC2 - Issue when IndexOf("") is used in the LINQ #34968
  • HasPendingModelChanges() always returns true #34967
  • Analyser issue with FindAsync #34966

Closed

  • Efbundle.exe doesn't automatically exit #34930
  • Complex property defined in base abstract class not being mapped in TPC #34763

PullRequests

Created

  • [TINY/CLEANUP] enabling test for scenario that was fixed earlier #34975
  • Return the default schema for owned entity types when not mapped to the same table as the owner. #34974
  • Update .Sources package reference #34973
  • Fix to #34960 - System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data #34969

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Checksum links not resolving or resolving to old .NET 8 preview 2 sha files #16981

PullRequests

Updated

  • Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #20216
